docs.snippet: Late goals from Martin Dimichelis and Martin Palermo preserved Argentina's perfect 3-0-0 record in Group B with a comfortable 2-0 win over Greece in Polokwane Tuesday night. Argentina won Group B with the maximum nine points and will face Mexico in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Late goals from Martin Dimichelis and Martin Palermo preserved Argentina's perfect 3-0-0 record in Group B with a comfortable 2-0 win over Greece in Polokwane Tuesday night. Argentina won Group B with the maximum nine points and will face Mexico in the round of 16 on Sunday. Argentina needed only to avoid a heavy defeat to progress. Coach Diego Maradona made seven changes to the team that beat South Korea 4-1 last Saturday. He handed the captain's armband to Lionel Messi, who gave a commanding midfield performance alongside the veteran Juan Sebastian Veron.
docs.abstract: Soccer Roundup; Argentina defeats Greece, 2-0, to finish in first place in World Cup Group B; photo (M)

headline.main: Perfect Argentina Makes Maradona Look Like a Genius

docs.snippet: In a stirring match worthy of dredging tears from both sides by its conclusion, South Korea found its dream while Nigeria exited the World Cup with some fresh, near-miss nightmares.     The Taeguk Warriors, solidifying the credentials they built with...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a stirring match worthy of dredging tears from both sides by its conclusion, South Korea found its dream while Nigeria exited the World Cup with some fresh, near-miss nightmares. The Taeguk Warriors, solidifying the credentials they built with a brazen run to the semifinals in the 2002 World Cup in South Korea and Japan, reached their first knockout stage of a World Cup on foreign soil when they rebounded from a 1-0 deficit, took a 2-1 lead, watched Nigeria match them at 2-2 on a penalty in the 69th minute, then held on with heaving lungs. As Group B runners-up, they will meet Group A winners Uruguay in the round of 16 while Group B winners Argentina play Group A runners-up Mexico.
docs.abstract: Soccer Roundup; South Korea reaches second round of World Cup by holding Nigeria to 2-2 tie; photo (M)

docs.snippet: South African fans vowed to continue to celebrate the World Cup, despite Bafana Bafana's elimination Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: JOHANNESBURG -- South African fans in the Newtown neighborhood were upbeat Tuesday night despite Bafana Bafana failing to advance to the next round of the World Cup.

docs.snippet: The Group G finale for both teams at Moses Mabhida Stadium in Durban, South Africa, described live, at it happens.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil and Portugal concluded their participation in the group phase of South Africa 2010 with a scoreless draw that started out chippy and ended up stultifyingly dull. But the result in Durban put both teams through to the knockout phase of the tournament.
